docs.text: UA Policy Working Group About We are a group of unmanned aviation enthusiasts interested in effective policy formulation for the drone ecosystem in India. Charter Civil Aviation Authorities worldwide have started rule making for unmanned aviation. There being several aspects to the field, we hope to take a holistic and informed approach to making recommendations to policy makers on such efforts in India. Some key work items (not in any particular order) are listed below. Policy Unmanned Aircraft Systems Unmanned Traffic Management (UTM) Technical Specification UTM Remote Identification and Tracking Documents Published See all .
